item.title: Squeal of Fortune?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Yes, you’ll have to have the newest cache to get that interface Id as I’m guessing it’s an interface.

Then you’ll have to figure out how to get that mouse thing to move… To get a sprite to move you could do something like this hypothetically:

	public void movingMouseSprite() {
		moving += 1;
		if(moving > 100) {
			moving = 100;
		}
		_____.drawsprite.(x-moving,y)
	}

Then put that method into method146 which is how the client draws sprites.

You would also have to get a loop to have the hover colors of those boxes be randomized and a random one being chosen from that loop.

You could create multiple arrays for potential prizes and then a multidimensional array to store all of those so that they get a different prize wheel everytime. Then a check so they can only do it twice a day. All in all, once you have the interface it wouldn’t be all that hard.

Read full topic
